Description.Name: James Fairchild
Description.Details: Background: James Fairchild, bearing the callsign "Hunter", is a 27-year-old MechWarrior of significant means and skill. Born into wealth and privilege, he chose to follow a unique path as a formidable bounty hunter. Gifted with abundant resources, he outfits his Mechs with state-of-the-art equipment and weaponry, making him a formidable force on any contract. Despite his privileged background, "Hunter" remains down-to-earth, committed to delivering swift justice and claiming bounties that challenge even the most skilled adversaries.
